title: In-Person
details: Connect an EMV payment device to take payments via swipe, dip or tap.

title: Online
details: Accept payments or donations on your website via a buy button, hosted payment page or integrated shopping cart.

title: In an App
details: Support payments made through digital wallets like PayPal and Apple Pay on your website or mobile app.

title: Over the Phone
details: Use any browser-connected device to enter card details for mail and phone orders.

title: In the Office
details: Manage customers, set up recurring payments, and email electronic invoices.
